Wang-chun Woo
dcterms:description: The HKO-7 dataset contains radar echo data from 2009 to 2015 collected by the Hong Kong Observatory. It includes radar CAPPI reflectivity images with a resolution of 480 × 480 pixels, taken from an altitude of 2km, covering a 512km × 512km area centered in Hong Kong. The data is recorded every 6 minutes, resulting in 240 frames per day, and is used for precipitation nowcasting.
dcterms:title: HKO-7

dcterms:creator: Nitish Srivastava
Elman Mansimov
Ruslan Salakhutdinov
dcterms:description: The MovingMNIST++ dataset is an extension of the original MovingMNIST dataset, designed to allow random rotations, scale changes, and illumination changes. Each frame is of size 64 × 64 and contains three moving digits. The dataset is used for evaluating models' ability to capture complex motion patterns.
dcterms:title: MovingMNIST++
